value: 2022 - Natural, Processed and Imitation Cheese Summary > Floridia Cheese Pty Ltd is a cheese manufacturer which produces up to 2,500 tonnes of cheese per annum. The company was founded in 1952 by Mauro Montalto and remains Australia's oldest family-owned manufacturer of Italian and Continental style cheese. Its products include ricotta, feta, hard cheese and mozzarella. Floridia Cheese products are found throughout Australia and in many overseas markets, widely distributed in retail, food service and industrial market sectors. Floridia Cheese is headquartered in the Melbourne suburb of Thomastown, Victoria. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
